string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: Who was the ruler of the USSR from 1917-1922?
In which year did the UK hand over Hong Kong sovereignty to China?
In which year did the Titanic sink?
What Apollo 13 astronaut contacted Mission Control with the words, \"Houston, we have a problem\"?
In which year did the demolition of the Berlin Wall begin?
What cocktail, named in Cuban Spanish, comprises white rum, lime/lemon, sugar and mint?
What smartphone operating system increased its market share from 4\%% in 2009 to 70\%% in 2013?
